titleStmt.title: The legend of great Cromvvel. By Michael Drayton Esquier
titleStmt.author: Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Felix Kyngston, and are to be sold by I. Flasket, dwelling in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the black Beare,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The legend of great Cromwell.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Paules Churchyard at the signe of the black Beare
